unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is a big issue for Bharat! My grandfather from Punjab used to say, "Too much is poison." Remember the Bt cotton controversy back in '05? We need better solutions, like training programs by IARI. I heard something about sustainable farming in Kerala during my visit on 10/10/2023. Need to check ICAR's report from 20/07/2024 at 14:00 hrs. My farmer friend Ramesh earns barely Rs. 50000 per year. Something's gotta change by 01/01/2025!
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide use is a big issue for Bharat! My grandfather from Punjab used to say, "Too much is poison." Remember the B T cotton controversy back in two thousand and five? We need better solutions, like training programs by I A R I. I heard something about sustainable farming in Kerala during my visit on tenth october two thousand and twenty three. Need to check I C A R's report from twentieth july two thousand and twenty four at fourteen hundred hours. My farmer friend Ramesh earns barely rupees fifty thousand per year. Something's gotta change by first january two thousand and twenty five!
